definition:
The *polymatroid* defined by a given matroid $(E,r)$ is the set of all
functions $w:E\to\mathbb{R}$ such that
$$w(e)\ge 0\qquad\text{for all }e\in E$$
$$\sum_{e\in S}w(e)\le r(S)\qquad\text{for all }S\subset E\;.$$
Polymatroids are related to the convex polytopes seen in linear
programming, and have similar uses.
